backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing customer, user profiles, loans, and request management with access‑controlled CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata describing a landing‑page UI change and its related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files covering styles, routing, utilities, pages, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with routes for landing, admin, customers, and requests, wrapped in an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: React error boundary displaying a fallback UI with reset‑to‑home behavior for uncaught errors.
Layout wrapper providing page container structure and a footer with branding and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/config/appConfig.ts: Defines the owner WhatsApp number and a helper to validate its configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches authenticated or anonymous backend actors using Internet Identity and initializes access control.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for admin checks and CRUD operations on customers and loans via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light/dark theme variables and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, wrapping it in React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AddCustomerPage: Admin page for creating new customers with form validation, permission checks, and customer list fetching.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin layout handling session validation, Internet Identity checks, admin permission gating, and navigation shell.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSignInPage: Admin sign-in page handling email validation, Internet Identity login, session creation, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/LoansPage.tsx: Admin loans dashboard displaying all loans with actions to close loans or record EMI payments using WhatsApp and backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerHome: Customer home page showing a welcome header and a button to create new finance requests, with session checks and sign-out.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerRequ: Customer request form that validates input, generates a WhatsApp message, and shows a success screen after submission.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerSign: Simple customer sign-in page that validates email, stores it in session, and redirects to the customer portal.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page UI offering navigation to the customer portal.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: 404 page with navigation options to go back or return home.
frontend/src/state/session.ts: Session utilities for storing, retrieving, and clearing admin and customer emails using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/email.ts: Email utilities for normalizing emails and validating admin authorization against a fixed allowed address.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Utility functions for formatting WhatsApp messages and generating WhatsApp links for admins and customers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and plugin support.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, existing features, and pending feature requests.
